summary: A young British punk and roadie for The Clash navigates life in socially torn 1970s England.
cast: Dave Armstrong|Barry Baker|Terry Barry|Reg Bazell|Stephen Behan|Graham Brown|Lizard Brown|Caroline Coon|John Daly|Hickey Etienne|Plaxy Exton|Tig Exton|Ian Galland|Ray Gange|Ben Gaze|Boss Goodman|Willy Graham|Johnny Green|Vic Hardwick|Topper Headon|Jerry Healey|Dave Johnson|Mick Jones|David McDonald|Terry McQuade|Roy Menuir|Barry Myers|Tommy O'Reilley|Jimmy Pursey|Howard Rainey|Paul Simonon|Tony Smith|Alan Stanleye|Joe Strummer|Ken Tillock|Dave Wakefield|John Woods|John Yates|Terence Dackombe|Margaret Thatcher
title: Rude Boy
